thread.title: Michigan State, Plaintiffs Return to Mediation in Suit Over Nassar Allegations

author: Melissa Korn
title: Michigan State, Plaintiffs Return to Mediation in Suit Over Nassar Allegations
text:
Mediation talks between hundreds of alleged victims of Dr. Larry Nassar and the various parties they say are responsible for his decades of sexual abuse could begin in the coming weeks, according to court filings and the parties involved.
In a motion filed in Michigan federal court Tuesday, lawyers for around 250 plaintiffs, Michigan State University, USA Gymnastics and other defendants asked the judge to extend deadlines regarding pretrial document production and efforts to dismiss the suits, saying they had found a mediator...
